__e: In fact, there are more and more thoughtful people, some of them a little bit frightened to come out in the open, but who quietly privately and some of then publicly are saying:
Mother, I have a thousand things to do, So would you go out and sit quietly in the garden?
And say you had quietly could be destroyed in your bed, like a guy your age.
I don't want you to have any worries at all.
What you have to do is go home and wait.
I couldn't let your father get off so easily and had to kill other people too
It's not so wrong to wait to die, to go quietly into the dark without incident, without fear, just resignation that all that could be done was done.
Instead, early one morning we met her, normal, while she was going to the beach with all her tribe.
One of them is to get in our car quietly and go with us to the clinic to see his doctor.
